pages.text: This mod offers other ways to transport your ill gotten gains using rails, who knew?
It has several additional minecraft tracks, loaders, and carts!  In the future there will be additional support added as well for other forms of transportation.

Make sure you make a 'wrench' to configure the sides of your loaders to be either 'input' or 'output' as you set up your automated empire.  The loaders support both Blocks and Entities (even Players!  Cart into a lava pit anyone?)
